content:
Good morning, I have a question about updating the terms of use when we create an account in Dataverse. To add a custom terms of use note, I can follow these steps in the documentation

https://guides.dataverse.org/en/5.12.1/installation/config.html#id228
Yes. Is there a question? :grinning:

Philip Durbin ğŸ‰ said:

Yes. Is there a question? :grinning:

What would be the structure of this file, would it have a model?
Using an HTML file is pretty common, I think, since HTML is supported. I would suggest experimenting.
